Use Nestjs or Gin framework to build backend services, database using Mysql, Postgresql and Mongo, familiar with Docker and K8s.

projectList.project_desc: With AI intelligent system as the core, Bee Glossary Camp is equipped with mainstream textbook content to achieve synchronized learning with the textbook, freeing students from a wide range of teaching aids and making it properly convenient.
projectList.project_content:
1. Front-end development using Taro + React + Mbox + Taro UI + Typescrip.
2. Develop backend services using Nestjs + Typeorm + Mongoose + Typescrip.
3. Developing server-side tools with golang and python.
4. Cooperate with testers to modify the bugs encountered in testing.

projectList.project_desc: Lithium Citizen is an electric car rental software, users can view the location of the electric car on the mobile map, a variety of models can be booked in advance to avoid no car available, affordable rent for a dollar can be a smooth ride, support temporary lock to bring you the convenience of travel!
projectList.project_content:

3. Product experience finely polished.
4. Establish a stability guarantee mechanism.
